title: 저작자 목록-DE
content:
[[module CSS]]
.content-panel.standalone {
  padding: 20px 30px;
}
.sp-art-title {
  font-size: 200%;
  font-weight: bold;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}
[[/module]]
[[div class="content-panel centered standalone series"]]
[[image http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--files/nav:side/CC-by-sa.png width="300px" link="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/deed.ko"]]
(cc) users of SCP-DE, some rights reserved.

According to [http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 License] used by The SCP Foundation, all article must be attributed.

This page is for authors of translated articles in SCP Korean Wiki. When translating, please note the original page and the original author in this page. If not available, please note it as author unknown.

Every legal forces are related to this page is in [http://www.scp-wiki.net/licensing-guide Licensing Guide].
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
[[div class="sp-art-title unmargined"]]
= SCP-DEs Credits
----
[[/div]]
* [[[scp-011-de|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/scp-011-de SCP-011-DE]" by "[[user oGER Toxic]]"
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
[[div class="sp-art-title unmargined"]]
= Tale-DEs Credits
----
[[/div]]
* [[[skp-portal|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/skp-portal  Sonderkommando für Paranormales-Portal]" by "[[user Dr_Grom]]"
* [[[abteilung-xxv-hub|]]] is based on "[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/department-xxv-hub  Department XXV Hub]" by "[[user Dr Ore]]",
 * which is based on "[http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/abteilung-xxv-hub  Abteilung XXV]" by "[[user Dr Ore]]"
* [[[magierakademie-hub|]]] is based on "[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/magierakademie-hub   Mages Academy - Hub]" by "[[user Dr_Grom]]",
 * which is based on "[http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/magierakademie-hub  Magierakademie Hub]" by "[[user Dr_Grom]]"
* [[[4r-hub|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/4r-hub  Das Vierte Reich (4R) ]" by "[[user Rikjard Regreps]]"
* [[[machina-portal|]]] is based on "[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/machina-portal Machina Hub]" by "[[user Dr Ore]]",
 * which is based on "[http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/machina-portal  Machina-Portal]" by "[[user Dr Ore]]"
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
[[div class="sp-art-title unmargined"]]
= Other-DEs Credits
----
[[/div]]
* [[[de-goi|]]] is based on "[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/de-goi  Groups of Interest in Germany and Austria]" by "[[user Rikjard Regreps]]", "[[user Dr_Grom]]", "[[user Dr Ore]]", "[[user TPS-Geronam]]",
 * which is based on "[http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/groups-of-interest Interessengruppen]" by various artists
* [[[skp-173-us|]]] is based on "[http://scp-wiki-de.wikidot.com/skp-173-us SKP-173-US]" by "[[user Dr_Grom]]"
[[/div]]
author: Salamander724
